body_html:
pip uninstall succesful

pip uninstall caffe2
Uninstalling caffe2-0.8.2:
/home/sam/anaconda3/envs/caffe36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/caffe2-0.8.2-py3.6-linux-x86_64.egg
Proceed (y/n)? y
Successfully uninstalled caffe2-0.8.2

conda install -c caffe2 caffe2-cuda9.0-cudnn7 successfull

It downgraded opencv from version 3.4.1 to 3.3.1 though

result of python -c 'from caffe2.python import core' 2>/dev/null && echo "Success" || echo "Failure"
is Failure

result of python -c 'from caffe2 import core' 2>/dev/null && echo "Success" || echo "Failure"
is Success
result of python -c 'from caffe2.python import workspace' 2>/dev/null && echo "Success" || echo "Failure"
is Failure

result of python -c 'from caffe2 import workspace' 2>/dev/null && echo "Success" || echo "Failure"
is Failure

opening python cli and following some basic commands from the tutorial notebook as:

from caffe2.python import core, workspace

which causes error:
WARNING:root:This caffe2 python run does not have GPU support. Will run in CPU only mode.
WARNING:root:Debug message: libnccl.so.2: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
CRITICAL:root:Cannot load caffe2.python. Error: /home/sam/anaconda3/envs/caffe36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/caffe2/python/../../../../libcaffe2.so: undefined symbol: _ZN6google15SetUsageMessageERKNSt7__cxx1112basic_stringIcSt11char_traitsIcESaIcEEE

Dunno what I should do next

I can confirm
that
site-packages now contain a directory called caffe2
and workspace.py exists now in ~/anaconda3/envs/caffe36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/caffe2/python

from caffe2.proto import caffe2_pb2 is also successful

what do I do to get workspace?

body:
**pip uninstall succesful**

pip uninstall caffe2
Uninstalling caffe2-0.8.2:
  /home/sam/anaconda3/envs/caffe36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/caffe2-0.8.2-py3.6-linux-x86_64.egg
Proceed (y/n)? y
  Successfully uninstalled caffe2-0.8.2

**conda install -c caffe2 caffe2-cuda9.0-cudnn7 successfull**

It downgraded opencv from version 3.4.1 to 3.3.1 though

result of **python -c 'from caffe2.python import core' 2>/dev/null && echo "Success" || echo "Failure"**
is **Failure**

result of **python -c 'from caffe2 import core' 2>/dev/null && echo "Success" || echo "Failure"**
is **Success**
result of **python -c 'from caffe2.python import workspace' 2>/dev/null && echo "Success" || echo "Failure"**
is **Failure**

result of **python -c 'from caffe2 import workspace' 2>/dev/null && echo "Success" || echo "Failure"**
is **Failure**

opening python cli and following some basic commands from the tutorial [notebook](https://github.com/caffe2/tutorials/blob/master/Basics.ipynb) as:
>>> from caffe2.python import core, workspace

which causes error:
WARNING:root:This caffe2 python run **does not have GPU support**. Will run in CPU only mode.
WARNING:root:Debug message: libnccl.so.2: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
CRITICAL:root:Cannot load caffe2.python. Error: /home/sam/anaconda3/envs/caffe36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/caffe2/python/../../../../libcaffe2.so: undefined symbol: _ZN6google15SetUsageMessageERKNSt7__cxx1112basic_stringIcSt11char_traitsIcESaIcEEE

Dunno what I should do next

I can confirm 
that 
site-packages now contain a directory called caffe2
and workspace.py exists now in **~/anaconda3/envs/caffe36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/caffe2/python**

**from caffe2.proto import caffe2_pb2** is also **successful**

what do I do to get workspace?
